item.description:
Let's meet in Davis Square and then head in together.  We'll meet inside Au bon pain and then take the subway into the festival on the MIT Campus.

Location: MIT Campus- Stratton Student Center-The Lobdell Dining Hall
item.why: It should be a fun time and also informative. I believe there will be an opportunity to walk through a visual storyline starting with the Tunisian and Egyptian revolutions and continuing onto the current events unfolding across the Arab world today.
item.name: Tahrir Square Festival - A Fundraiser for Egypt
